text: Alice in Wonderland is a 1903 British silent fantasy movie directed by Cecil Hepworth and Percy StowAlan Goble. The Complete Index to Literary Sources in FilmAlice in Wonderland and stars May Clark, Cecil M. Hepworth, and Geoffrey Faithfull. ==Actors== * May Clark as Alice * Cecil M. Hepworth as Frog * Geoffrey Faithfull as Playing Card * Stanley Faithfull as Playing Card * Mrs. Margaret Hepworth as White Rabbit / Queen of Hearts * Norman Whitten as Mad Hatter / Fish ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:British movies Category:1903 movies Category:British silent movies Category:British fantasy movies
title: Alice in Wonderland (1903 movie)
